events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The issue has been identified as related to refund due to incorrect product sent to customer.
A customer service agent has been assigned to handle the refund request for this case.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. Iâ€™m here to assist you with your refund request.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm the item you received that was incorrect?
My order number is 8796543 and I was supposed to get a blender, but instead received a toaster.
We will process a full refund immediately and send you a prepaid return label for the incorrect item.
Thank you for the quick response and solution. I appreciate the prepaid return label offer.
Your refund request has been processed and you will receive confirmation once the return is complete.
Checking in to make sure you received the refund and to see if you need any further assistance.
We are closing this case now. Please contact us again if you require any more help in the future.
